fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Consumers, Environment, Single market, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Directive for the reduction of use of plastic mono-use shopping bags in the EU. Circular Economy Package: EU Action Plan for the Circular Economy.
organisation_name: associazione italiana delle bioplastiche e dei materiali biodegradabili e compostabili (ASSOBIOPLASTICHE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
To promote the development of the use of bioplastics in packaging, agricolture and other uses, through education, information, formation, events and newsletters etc. 
The Association also works through the legislative process to promote the use of bioplastics and to ensure the application of European packaging standards, in particular EN 13432.
